wikipedia_page.main: Maureen Milgram Forrest was the co-founder of LeicesterHERday Trust and the original project director for the BRIT School in Croydon, London.  She is also known as Lillian Maureen Bernice Forrest. She was born in London, England on 1 February 1938 and died in Victoria, British Columbia, on 1 March 2013.

response: * Maureen Milgram Forrest, the founder chair and current chair, Leicesterherday Trust, Leicester
